statements: SELECT * FROM EventMarketingData;
SELECT event_name, ticket_sales FROM EventMarketingData WHERE ticket_sales > 1000;
SELECT event_name, promotional_activities FROM EventMarketingData WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EventMarketingData WHERE ticket_sales < 500 OR promotional_activities LIKE '%online%';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM EventMarketingData ORDER BY event_name DESC, event_id ASC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_sales FROM EventMarketingData WHERE ticket_sales > 1000 ORDER BY ticket_sales DESC;
SELECT event_name, promotional_activities FROM EventMarketingData WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY campaign_start_date;
SELECT * FROM EventMarketingData WHERE event_name LIKE '%Summer%' AND promotional_activities IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, campaign_end_date FROM EventMarketingData WHERE campaign_end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_sales, promotional_activities FROM EventMarketingData WHERE ticket_sales > 500 AND campaign_start_date < '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT event_id, sale_date, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_description, activity_date FROM promotional_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY event_id ORDER BY total_sold DESC;
SELECT event_id, ticket_price, quantity_sold, ticket_price * quantity_sold AS revenue FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT ticket_id, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM ticket_sales WHERE event_id = 1 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotional_activities WHERE event_id = 2 AND activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(ticket_price * quantity_sold) AS total_sales FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC, quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT activity_description, activity_date FROM promotional_activities WHERE event_id = 3 AND activity_date < '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM events WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Online';
SELECT ticket_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC, ticket_price ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_type='Online'
SELECT event_name, ticket_price, sale_amount FROM events JOIN ticket_sales ON events.event_id = ticket_sales.event_id WHERE ticket_sales.sale_amount > 100
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM events WHERE ticket_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CampaignResults;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EventCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, sale_date, ticket_price FROM TicketSales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM PromotionalActivities WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_id, tickets_sold, revenue FROM CampaignResults WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC, tickets_sold ASC;
SELECT * FROM EventCampaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EventCampaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1
SELECT campaign_id, count(*) as total_sales FROM TicketSales GROUP BY campaign_id
SELECT * FROM PromotionalActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Social Media' ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(revenue) as total_revenue FROM CampaignResults GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_revenue > 10000
SELECT * FROM event_campaigns;
SELECT id, campaign_name, budget FROM event_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM event_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_type, sale_amount FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name FROM event_attendees WHERE event_campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM event_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM event_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM event_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC, campaign_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT event_attendees.attendee_name, promotional_activities.activity_type FROM event_attendees INNER JOIN promotional_activities ON event_attendees.event_campaign_id = promotional_activities.event_campaign_id WHERE promotional_activities.cost < 1000;

SELECT event_campaigns.campaign_name, SUM(ticket_sales.sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM event_campaigns INNER JOIN ticket_sales ON event_campaigns.id = ticket_sales.event_campaign_id GROUP BY event_campaigns.campaign_name HAVING total_sales > 5000;
